佉字的基本解释

佉
qū
古同“祛”。

佉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qū］
［《廣韻》丘伽切，平戈，溪。］
［《字彙》丘於切］
(1)梵语的译音。悉昙体文三十五字中牙声的第二音。
(2)指佉卢蝨吒。佛教传说中创造佉卢文的人。
(3)见“佉苴”。

佉字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　佉； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页98第03
【正韻】丘於切，音區。與祛同。　又國名。【內典】薄佉羅，卽月支也。　又人名。【法苑珠林】造書凡三人，長曰梵，其書右行。次書佉盧，其書左行。少者倉頡，其書下行。　又【廣韻】丘伽切【集韻】【類篇】去伽切，?恰平聲。姓也。　又佉沙國，卽疏勒也。見【唐書·異域志】　又神名。【釋書】佛說彌勒成佛經，其先轉輪聖王，名儴佉。有四種兵，不以威武，治四天下。　又【陀羅尼經】佉佉。【註】文殊眷屬。【又】佉呬佉呬。【註】普賢眷屬。◎按佉，梵音去佐切，見就形門。今不从，只以音和門，丘伽切，釋之爲是。

佉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
佉字的起名意思

暂无。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
qū
Gu Tong "dispelled".
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qū］
["Guang Yun" Qiu Jiaqie, Ping Ge, Xi. ]
["Words" Qiu Yuqie]
(1) Transliteration of Sanskrit. The second tone of Yasheng in the thirty-five characters of Xitan style.
(2) Refers to Lu Shizha. The person who created the Luwen in Buddhist legends.
(3) See "轉苴".
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　佉; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 98 Page 03
[Zheng Yun] Qiu Yuqie, sound area. Same with Qu.　 Also the name of the country. 【Internal Code】Bo Tuanluo, Luyuezhi also.　Another name. [Fayuan Zhulin] There are three people who made the book, and the book is called Brahma, and the book runs on the right. The second book is Lu, and his book runs on the left. The youngest Cangjie, his book goes down.　[Guang Yun] Qiu Jiaqie [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter] Go to Jiaqie,? Chaping sound. Last name also.　You are in the country of Sha, and you are also Shu Le. See 【Tangshu·Exotic History】　also the name of God. 【Explanation】The Buddha said that Maitreya became a Buddhist scripture, and he first revolved around the holy king, and his name was Dan. There are four types of soldiers, and they do not rule the four worlds with might.　[Dharani Sutra] again. [Note] Manjusri family members. [Also] 彉呬彉呬. [Note] Family members of Samantabhadra. ◎Press 佉, Sanskrit goes to Zuoqie, and you see the Xingmen. If I don’t follow it today, I only use Yinhemen, Chugache, to explain it as true.
